import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const Edit = () => { const auth = useSelector(state => state.auth); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: auth.user.email, characterType: auth.user.characterTyep, currentList : auth.user.currentList }); return (

Account

{setFormData({...formData, email: e.target.value})}} type="text" name="email" id="email" className="form-control"/>
) } export default Edit;
